isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 7000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - HEADLIGHT ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: HEADLIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVE
svcsubproc.para: To remove the headlight assembly refer to the procedure for removing and installing the grille and shroud. The grille and shroud must be removed prior to removing the headlight assembly.

step1.para: Tilt the hood assembly forward, disconnect the headlight and clearance light harness ( Figure 13, Item 1).
Tilt hood to original position. Loosen and remove the headlight assembly mounting nuts ( Figure 40, Item 7) from the fender assembly.
To remove the opposite side headlight assembly follow the procedures as listed above.

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. PASSENGER SIDE HEAD LIGHT AND DIRECTIONAL ASSEMBLY

specpara.para: Headlight adjustment is addressed in ADJUSTMENTS section.

svcsubproc.title: Headlight - Install
svcsubproc.para: The grille and shroud assembly should have been previously removed.

step1.para: Insert the headlight assembly ( Figure 40, Item 6) into the headlight housing opening ( Figure 40, Item 4), aligning the mounting studs ( Figure 40, Item 7) with the mounting holes in the headlight housing).
Install the headlight assembly mounting nuts ( Figure 40, Item 7) on the mounting studs located on the rear of the headlight housing. Tighten nuts to torque value on torque chart.
Reconnect the clearance light harness into the headlight harness. Plug the headlight harness into the chassis harness located above the frame rail section at the radiator mounting block.
Tilt the hood back and secure the hood latches.
